draft.title: SMARTYPANTS Promoted To Big Sister Retro Van T-Shirt for Girls - New Sibling Announcement Gift | Older Daughter Present | Family Celebration Top | Cool Hippy Flower Design | Toddler Apparel
draft.description:
Celebrate a magical family milestone with this adorable 'Promoted to Big Sister' t-shirt! This charming top is the perfect way to announce your growing family and make your eldest feel incredibly special and proud of her new role. The design features a wonderfully retro camper van with a groovy, hippy vibe, complete with cute flowers and hearts.

Printed in a beautiful gradient of purple and red, this t-shirt is as stylish as it is meaningful. Crafted from soft and comfortable fabric, it's ideal for everything from the big announcement photoshoot to everyday play. It’s a wonderful keepsake and a thoughtful gift for any new big sister, helping her to welcome her new sibling with excitement and love.
draft.keywords: tee shirt garment clothes clothing outfit kids children child girl kiddo little one youth young baby shower gender reveal birthday christmas idea expecting parents mum dad new-baby groovy 70s vintage style campervan vehicle truck hearts love peace fun cute pretty beautiful colourful gradient purple red quality premium soft comfortable durable functional everyday lifestyle well-made breathable cotton machine washable eldest firstborn becoming a sis siblings brother member
bullets: Celebrate Her Promotion – Announce her new role with this fun 'Promoted to Big Sister' tee featuring a groovy retro van, making it a perfect gift for pregnancy announcements or baby showers.
Soft Comfortable Fabric – Made from high-quality, breathable cotton that is gentle on your child's skin, ensuring all-day comfort for playdates, parties, and family celebrations.
Durable Everyday Wear – Expertly stitched for durability, this top is designed to withstand frequent washing and active play, making it a practical and long-lasting wardrobe staple.
Vibrant Gradient Print – The charming hippy van design is printed using advanced techniques for a fade-resistant finish, ensuring the beautiful purple-to-red gradient stays bright.
Perfect Sibling Gift – A thoughtful present to make an older sibling feel special and included, ideal for family photoshoots or as a surprise to celebrate the new family member.
